name: Alternative Fantasy
description:
Alternative Fantasy is a platform minigame. You can choose between venturing through the Maze  of Stars or the Castle of Traps. I hope you have fun!

Please feel free to leave your feedback in the comments. This game is still a prototype. so let me know if you find bugs. I hope to finish it soon.

   Keyboard Controls:  

  • Arrows = Movement 
  • Space = Jump
  • Esc = Pause
  • Mouse click = Select menu option
  • F = Attack

  How to play:  

  • Game 1: Follow the diamonds to find the hidden swords 
  • Game  2: Reach the magic portal before time runs out

A game by Ane Meman

Special thanks to:
